summary.span: 提供 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素的属性、事件和方法的 WPF 框架级别集。

span.span: Provides a WPF framework-level set of properties, events, and methods for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

summary.span: 此类表示所提供的 WPF 框架级别实现基于 定义的 WPF 核心级别 API。

span.span: This class represents the provided WPF framework-level implementation that is built on the WPF core-level APIs that are defined by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 WPF 框架级别元素类的 WPF 核心级集之间的连接点表示服务。 is the connecting point between WPF framework-level element classes and the WPF core-level set of presentation services. 有关这些概念的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 体系结构](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md)。For more information about these concepts, see [WPF Architecture](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-architecture.md). 扩展和添加了以下功能： extends and adds the following capabilities: - **布局系统定义**:对于某些已定义为中的虚拟成员的方法提供特定的 WPF 框架级别实现。**Layout system definition**: provides specific WPF framework-level implementations for certain methods that were defined as virtual members in . 最值得注意的是，会对某些 WPF 核心级布局重写，并改为提供应改为替代派生类的 WPF 框架级别等效项。Most notably, seals certain WPF core-level layout overrides, and instead provides a WPF framework-level equivalent that derived classes should override instead. 例如，密封但提供。For example, seals but provides . 这些更改反映在 WPF 框架级别是否有一个完整的布局系统可以呈现任何的位置中的事实派生类。These changes reflect the fact that at the WPF framework-level there is a full layout system in place that can render any derived class. 在 WPF 核心构建常规的级别，某些成员[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基于的布局解决方案位于的位置，但未定义该布局系统的实际引擎。At the WPF core level, certain members that will structure a general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] based layout solution are in place, but the actual engine of the layout system is not defined. 有关详细信息，请参阅[布局](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md)。For more information, see [Layout](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout.md). - **逻辑树：**常规[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]编程模型通常按正在元素树表示。**The logical tree:** The general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programming model is often expressed in terms of being a tree of elements. 支持表示为一个逻辑树中，元素树，同时还支持在标记中定义该树是实现在级别。Support for expressing the tree of elements as a logical tree, and accompanying support for defining that tree in markup is implemented at the level. 请注意但是该故意不会定义内容模型，并使这一责任派生的类。Note however that deliberately does not define a content model, and leaves that responsibility to derived classes. 有关详细信息，请参见 [WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md). - **对象生存期事件：**通常是有用知道初始化某个元素时 （调用的构造函数） 或元素时首次加载到逻辑树。**Object lifetime events:** It is often useful to know when an element is initialized (the constructor is called) or when the element is first loaded into a logical tree. 定义与对象生存期相关的代码隐藏操作，涉及元素，例如添加更多的子元素提供有用的挂钩的多个事件。 defines several events related to object lifetime that provide useful hooks for code-behind operations that involve elements, such as adding more child elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[对象生存期事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md)。For more information, see [Object Lifetime Events](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md). - **支持数据绑定和动态资源引用：**由实现数据绑定和资源的属性级别支持类并包含在属性系统，但若要解决的成员值的功能存储为（提供支持数据绑定和动态资源的编程构造） 实现的。**Support for data binding and dynamic resource references:** The property-level support for data binding and resources is implemented by the class and embodied in the property system, but the ability to resolve a member value that is stored as an (the programming construct that underlies both data binding and dynamic resources) is implemented by . 有关详细信息，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)和[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md) and [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). - **样式：** 定义属性。**Styles:** defines the property. 但是，尚未定义支持模板，或者支持修饰器。However, does not yet define support for templates, or support decorators. 这些功能通过引入的控件类如和。These features are introduced by control classes such as and . - **更多的动画支持：**一些动画支持已定义为在 WPF 核心级别，但通过实现其进行扩展和相关成员。**More animation support:** Some animation support was already defined at the WPF core level, but extends this by implementing and related members. 如下所示的类层次结构中，从许多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]类派生自、 直接或通过中间基类如或。As can be seen from the class hierarchy, many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] classes derive from , either directly or through intermediate base classes such as or . 如果你想要使用为基类，你可能想要首先检查现有的派生的类。If you intend to use as a base class, you might want to first examine the existing derived classes. 对大量的基本方案提供支持，但还没有大量的意义上的用于创建构建基块"element"为所需的功能[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。 provides support for a number of basic scenarios, but also lacks a number of features that are desirable for an "element" in the sense of a building block that you use to create [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 例如，未定义任何 true 的内容模型;如基类未定义一个属性，可以创建[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]子元素。For instance, a does not define any true content model; as a base class does not define a property that can create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] child elements. 具体而言，你可能想要查看和。In particular, you might want to look at and .

value.span: 默认值为 0（零）。

span.span: The default value is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是基于其他高度输入和布局系统的计算的值。This property is a calculated value based on other height inputs, and the layout system. 值由布局系统本身，基于实际呈现处理过程中，设置，并可能因此稍微属性的设置值如所输入的更改的基础。The value is set by the layout system itself, based on an actual rendering pass, and may therefore lag slightly behind the set value of properties such as that are the basis of the input change. 因为是计算得出的值，你应注意可能有多个或增量报告导致发生更改与其各种操作由布局系统。Because is a calculated value, you should be aware that there could be multiple or incremental reported changes to it as a result of various operations by the layout system. 布局系统可能会计算子元素所需的测量空间、父元素的约束等。The layout system may be calculating required measure space for child elements, constraints by the parent element, and so on. 虽然您无法设置此属性从[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您可以基于在样式中其值时。Although you cannot set this property from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you can base a upon its value in a style. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例显示了各种高度属性。The following example displays various height properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法用于实现的上表示的元素的逻辑子元素的对象的集合。Use this method for the implementation of collections on objects that represent logical child elements of an element. 子元素集合的集合维护操作可能会在属性 getter 或 setter，类处理的更改事件、 构造函数，或在这些集合类型本身。Collection maintenance for child element collections might be done in property getters or setters, class handling of Changed events, constructors, or within the collection types themselves. 对于控件作者操作在此级别的逻辑树不是建议的做法，除非所有可用的基控件类的内容模型都适用于你的控件方案。For control authors, manipulating the logical tree at this level is not the recommended practice, unless none of the content models for available base control classes are appropriate for your control scenario. 请考虑级别的子类化， ，和。Consider subclassing at the level of , , and . 这些类提供的内容模型通过专用的逻辑树子元素的特定强制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]，以及对其他功能中通常所需的支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]控件如通过模板的样式。These classes provide a content model with particular enforcement of logical tree child elements through dedicated [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)], as well as support for other features typically desirable in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] control such as styling through templates. 有关详细信息如何使用和，请参阅[WPF 中的树](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md)。For more information on how to use and , see [Trees in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/trees-in-wpf.md). 如果在另一个进程循环访问的逻辑树时调用，则可能引发异常。 may throw an exception if called at a time when the logical tree is being iterated by another process. ## Examples 下面的示例实现`Child`的自定义属性执行其自己的可视化层实现。The following example implements a `Child` property on a custom that does its own visual layer implementation. 属性 setter 的设计目的的因此如果值发生更改，从逻辑树中，以及特定于类的可视集合中删除旧值。The property setter is designed so that if the value changes, the old value is removed from the logical tree, as well as a class-specific visual collection. 属性值进行缓存，并随后将新值添加到逻辑树和自定义的可视集合。The property value is cached, and then the new value is added to both the logical tree and the custom visual collection. [!code-csharp[CompositionTargetRenderingAnimations#AddRemoveLogicalChild](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CompositionTargetRenderingAnimations/CSharp/ParticleEffectExamples/OverlayRenderDecorator.cs#addremovelogicalchild)] [!code-vb[CompositionTargetRenderingAnimations#AddRemoveLogicalChild](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CompositionTargetRenderingAnimations/visualbasic/particleeffectexamples/overlayrenderdecorator.vb#addremovelogicalchild)]

summary.span: 在必要时生成当前模板的可视化树，然后返回一个值，该值指示可视化树是否由此调用重新生成。

span.span: Builds the current template's visual tree if necessary, and returns a value that indicates whether the visual tree was rebuilt by this call.

returns.span: 如果在树中添加了视觉对象，则返回 ；否则返回 。

span.span: if visuals were added to the tree; returns otherwise.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序可以调用此方法要保证元素的可视化树的完整性。Applications can call this method to guarantee that the visual tree of an element is complete. 如果检查在代码中的树中的子元素，则可能需要采用此保证步骤。This guarantee step might be necessary if code will be checking the child elements in the tree. 为调用的应用程序中的典型元素逻辑不是有必要，因为模板将应用到合适的点处的元素在其生存期自动。For typical element logic within applications, calling is not necessary, because templates will be applied to elements at an appropriate point in their lifetimes automatically. 在每个度量值上调用传递的 WPF 框架级别布局系统。 is called on every Measure pass by the WPF framework-level layout system. 派生的类可以使用类处理程序的情况下其中显式调用此方法或由布局系统接收通知。 derived classes can use the class handler to be notified of cases where this method was called explicitly, or by the layout system. 模板是完全生成的附加到逻辑树中后调用。 is called after the template is completely generated and attached to the logical tree.

summary.span: 启动此元素的初始化过程。

span.span: Starts the initialization process for this element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你在执行尚未公开或将元素连接到任何元素树的方式调整它们，你可以对单独的元素调用此方法。You can call this method on individual elements if you are adjusting them in ways that do not yet expose or connect the element to any element tree. 例如，你可能创建了一个新，但具有尚未将其附加到任何逻辑树。For instance, you might have created a new , but have not yet attached it to any logical tree. 或者，其中你元素是一个子元素在它的逻辑树可能不会连接到的窗口或页的应用程序。Or, the logical tree where your element is a child element within it might not be connected to a window or page of the application.

para.span: 实现此方法以提供您的元素初始化将在元素中加载过程之前应发生这种情况的特殊处理。

span.span: Implement this method to provide special handling that should happen before your element is initialized during the element loading process.

para.span: 您的实现应调用基实现，因为基 （默认） 实现设置某些内部标志来跟踪初始化。

span.span: Your implementation should call the base implementation, because the base (default) implementation sets some internal flags to keep track of initialization.

para.span: 一个可能的实现是使用此方法作为挂钩到尚未启用由构造函数自己私有类初始化例程。

span.span: One possible implementation is to use this method as a hook into your own private class initialization routines that are not already enabled by constructors.

para.span: 基实现将引发异常，如果称为不止一次在同一元素上之前调用。

span.span: The base implementation will throw an exception if is called more than one time on the same element prior to being called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数典型动画方案不使用此方法。Most typical animation scenarios do not use this method. 通常，你创建或元素标记，然后将其作为上一个元素的内容。Typically, you create the or element in markup, and then you place these as the content on an element. 当触发事件，动画将运行。When triggered by the event, the animation then runs. 控制的各个方面的大多数可以通过在标记中公开的属性进行寻址。Most of the control aspects of a can be addressed by properties that are exposed in markup. 不使用的签名`isControllable`，参数，或指定该参数时， `false`，动画达到"填充"期时，就会立即删除了与动画的时间线时钟。For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks that are associated with the animation are removed as soon as the animation reaches the "Fill" period. 因此，在动画运行一次后将不能是重启。Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after running once. 动画的控制还要求情节提要具有[X:name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)或可由代码中的引用。Controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard have an [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) or be accessible by reference in code. ## Examples 下面的示例检索从资源，然后运行，内部事件时处理的类。The following example retrieves a from resources, and then runs that when an internal event is class handled. remarks.format: ## Remarks 大多数典型动画方案不使用此方法。Most typical animation scenarios do not use this method. 通常，你创建或元素标记，然后将其作为上一个元素的内容。Typically, you create the or element in markup, and then you place these as the content on an element. 当触发事件，动画将运行。When triggered by the event, the animation then runs. 控制的各个方面的大多数可以通过在标记中公开的属性进行寻址。Most of the control aspects of a can be addressed by properties that are exposed in markup. 不使用的签名`isControllable`，参数，或指定该参数时， `false`，动画达到"填充"期时，就会立即删除了与动画的时间线时钟。For the signatures that do not use the `isControllable`, parameter, or when that parameter is specified `false`, the timeline clocks that are associated with the animation are removed as soon as the animation reaches the "Fill" period. 因此，在动画运行一次后将不能是重启。Therefore the animation cannot be restarted after running once. 动画的控制还要求情节提要具有[X:name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)或可由代码中的引用。Controlling an animation also requires that the storyboard have an [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) or be accessible by reference in code. 切换行为可以指定的属性为。Handoff behavior can be specified as an attribute of . ## 使用使用Using the Compose HandoffBehavior 当你将， ，或到通过使用属性 、 任何以前与该属性关联的对象可继续使用系统资源; 计时系统将执行不自动删除时钟。When you apply a , , or to a property by using the , any objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove the clocks automatically. 若要避免性能问题时通过使用应用大量的时钟，完成后，应从属性的基值移除组合时钟。To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks by using , you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete. 有多种方法来移除时钟：There are several ways to remove a clock: - 若要从属性中移除所有时钟，请使用或动画对象的方法。To remove all clocks from a property, use the or method of the animated object. 指定正进行动画处理的第一个参数的属性和`null`为第二个。Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second. 这从属性中移除所有动画时钟。This removes all animation clocks from the property. - 若要删除特定时钟的列表，从使用属性检索，然后调用方法。To remove a specific from a list of clocks, use the property of the to retrieve a , then call the method of the . 这通常是时钟的事件处理程序。This is typically done in the event handler for a clock. 请注意，仅根时钟可以受;属性子时钟返回`null`。Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a ; the property of a child clock returns `null`. 另请注意，如果时钟的有效持续时间都是永久性的则不会引发事件。Note also that the event is not raised if the effective duration of the clock is forever. 在这种情况下，用户必须确定何时调用。In that case, the user must determine when to call . 此动画问题主要出现在生存期较长的对象上。This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime. 一个对象进行垃圾回收，其时钟还断开连接，并垃圾收集。When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected. 有关时钟对象的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例检索从资源，然后运行，内部事件时处理的类。The following example retrieves a from resources, and then runs that when an internal event is class handled. remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以用于验证对象的多个属性的值。A can be used to validate the values of multiple properties of an object. 例如，假设应用程序提示用户输入地址，然后填充类型的对象`Address`，其中具有属性`Street`， `City`， `ZipCode`，和`Country`，使用值的用户提供。For example, suppose that an application prompts the user to enter an address and then populates an object of type `Address`, which has the properties `Street`, `City`, `ZipCode`, and `Country`, with the values that the user provided. 应用程序具有包含四个面板控件，其中每个绑定到对象的属性之一。The application has a panel that contains four controls, each of which is bound to one of the object’s properties. 你可以使用中验证`Address`对象。You can use a in a to validate the `Address` object. 例如，可确保邮政编码的有效地址的国家/地区。For example, the can ensure that the zip code is valid for the country of the address. 子元素继承从其父元素，就像使用任何其他可继承的属性。Child elements inherit the from their parent elements, just as with any other inheritable property. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|| ## Examples 以下示例是应用的检查用户是否已设置为相等的值的两个对象的属性的一部分。The following examples are part of an application that checks whether the user has set the properties of two objects to equal values. 第一个示例创建两个控件，其中每个绑定到不同的数据源。The first example creates two controls, each of which is bound to a different data source. 具有包含，用于检查两个字符串是否相等。The has a that contains a that checks that the two strings are equal. [!code-xaml[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupComplete](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml#bindinggroupcomplete)] 下面的示例演示前面的示例使用。The following example shows the that the previous example uses. 在方法重写时，此示例获取从每个源对象并检查对象的属性是否相等。In the method override, the example gets each source object from the and checks whether the properties of the objects are equal. [!code-csharp[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/CSharp/Window3.xaml.cs#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)] [!code-vb[BindingGroupSnippets#BindingGroupNameValidationRule](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindingGroupSnippets/visualbasic/window3.xaml.vb#bindinggroupnamevalidationrule)] 若要调用，调用方法。To invoke the , call the method. 下面的示例调用按钮的 click 事件发生时。The following example calls when the click event of the button occurs. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过调用此方法，你将提升源自当前元素的事件。By calling this method, you raise a event that originates from the current element. 将引发此事件，以便其可以通过处理，或派生或类似的类。This event is raised so that it can be handled by a , or a derived or similar class. 预期的行为是由父元素，标记为已处理的事件数据，在处理此事件和事件的源放入通过中嵌入的逻辑视图控件。The expected behavior is that the event is handled by the parent element, marked handled in the event data, and the source of the event is brought into view through the logic embedded in the control. 既不事件也不方法不会传输有关的成功或失败，而非，通常会将事件标记上处理的成功的任何信息。Neither the event nor the method transmit any information about success or failure, other than that the event is typically marked handled on success. 问题的原因失败可以包括元素设置，如以外的值。Reasons for failure can include the element settings, such as being some value other than . 如果使用未指定的签名`targetRectangle`，然后的整个元素大小 (其) 将变为可见。If you use the signature that does not specify a `targetRectangle`, then the entire element size (its ) will be made visible. 通过调用此方法，你可能将调用在任何父可滚动区域中包含的元素。By calling this method, you potentially will call on any parent scrollable area that contains the element. 如果此元素不包含在可滚动区域中，仍引发事件，但因为没有事件侦听器将是不起作用。If this element is not contained in a scrollable area, the event is still raised, but there will be no effect because there are no event listeners. ## Examples 下面的示例实现每当响应的应用程序导航事件处理程序[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]要导航到包含碎片。The following example implements a handler for an application navigation event that responds whenever the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] being navigated to includes a fragment. 在名为片段[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的哈希符号 （#），并且实现的行为将导致要滚动到视图的框架内的元素。The fragment is named in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] following the hash sign (#), and the implemented behavior causes the element to scroll into view within the frame. 和请求在示例中的滚动行为。 and request that scrolling behavior in the example. [!code-csharp[FragmentNavigationSample#FEBringIntoView](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentNavigationSample/CSharp/MainWindow.xaml.cs#febringintoview)] [!code-vb[FragmentNavigationSample#FEBringIntoView](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FragmentNavigationSample/VisualBasic/MainWindow.xaml.vb#febringintoview)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要取消关闭上下文菜单，事件的处理程序应将其标记为已处理。To suppress closing context menus, handlers of the event should mark it as handled. 若要将此事件用作样式，则必须引用的事件的基础服务的定义：To use this event as an in a style, you must reference the underlying service's definition of the event: [!code-xaml[CorePseudocode#FEContextMenuClosing](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/pseudocode.xaml#fecontextmenuclosing)] (此用法是必需的因为上的事件实现，公开基础的服务事件未映射标识符以便你可以将它用作触发器)。(This usage is required because the event implementation on that exposes the underlying service event does not map the identifier such that you can use it as a trigger). 本身是派生类，但事件不会引发由上下文菜单直接。 itself is a derived class, but the event will not be raised by a context menu directly. 相反，从"拥有"作为属性的上下文菜单，并仅在用户尝试关闭用户界面中的上下文菜单时引发的元素，将引发事件。Instead, the event is raised from the element that "owns" the context menu as a property and is only raised when a user attempts to close a context menu in the UI. 但是有可能本身可以具有属性 （嵌套的上下文菜单）。However it is possible for itself to have a property (a nested context menu). 在这种情况下实际上确实拥有嵌套，可能引发事件，与嵌套的上下文菜单上的事件源。In this case the really does own the nested and might raise the event, with the source of the event being the nested context menu. 类本身也有类似的事件 () 但事件不提供你取消用户执行任何操作的机会。The class itself also has a similar event () but the event does not provide you the opportunity to cancel the user action. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要手动打开上下文菜单，事件的处理程序应将相关的事件标记为已处理。To manually open context menus, handlers of the events should mark the relevant event as handled. 否则为的现有值属性将用于自动打开上下文菜单。Otherwise, the existing value of the property will be used to automatically open a context menu. 将标记处理的事件可有效地取消的默认操作，并且可重置的值的机会属性，然后打开新。Marking the event handled will effectively cancel the default action, and could be an opportunity to reset the value of the property and then open the new . 但是，没有应该注意的计时问题。However, there is a timing issue you should be aware of. 若要完全替换通过上下文菜单处理程序中，初始上下文菜单不能为 null / 空。In order to completely replace the context menu through a handler, the initial context menu must not be null / empty. 或者，你可能需要处理该事件，然后手动打开新的上下文菜单。Alternatively, you might need to handle the event and then manually open a new context menu. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 处理 ContextMenuOpening 事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md)。For details, see [How to: Handle the ContextMenuOpening Event](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-handle-the-contextmenuopening-event.md). 若要将此事件用作样式，则必须引用基础的附加的事件：To use this event as an in a style, you must reference the underlying attached event: [!code-xaml[CorePseudocode#FEContextMenuOpening](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/pseudocode.xaml#fecontextmenuopening)] (此用法是必需的因为上的事件实现，公开基础的服务事件未映射标识符以便在触发器中使用它)。(This usage is required because the event implementation on that exposes the underlying service event does not map the identifier such that you can use it in triggers). 本身是派生类，但不是会从上下文菜单中打开作为源引发此事件。 itself is a derived class, but this event will not be raised from the context menu being opened as a source. 从"拥有"作为属性的上下文菜单，并仅在用户尝试在 UI 中打开上下文菜单时引发的元素，将引发事件。The event is raised from the element that "owns" the context menu as a property and is only raised when a user attempts to open a context menu in the UI. 之所以本身可以具有属性，但你应避免这种情况下 (有关详细信息，请参阅)。It is possible for itself to have a property, but you should avoid this scenario (for details, see ). 类本身也有类似的事件 () 但不提供机会取消用户执行任何操作。The class itself also has a similar event () but does not provide you the opportunity to cancel the user action. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| - summary.span: 获取或设置在鼠标指针位于此元素上时显示的光标。

span.span: Gets or sets the cursor that displays when the mouse pointer is over this element.

value.span: 要显示的光标。

value.span: 按此依赖属性，默认值定义为 。

span.span: The default value is defined as per this dependency property.

value.span: 但是，运行时的实际默认值将受到多种因素的影响。

span.span: However, the practical default at run time will come from a variety of factors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设置此属性时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器依赖于针对类型转换类来计算该字符串。When you set this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor relies on type conversion for the class to evaluate the string. 所提供的字符串的计算结果应为值。The provided string should evaluate to a value. 有关详细信息，请参阅。See for details. 是否建立此属性的光标将或将不会显示在鼠标指针位于此元素时也是依赖于的值属性。Whether the cursor as established by this property will or will not display when the mouse pointer is over this element is also dependent on the value of the property. 此外，与事件相关的注意事项，如活动拖动、 鼠标捕获、 文本编辑控件，以此类推内, 模式还将影响光标，并且其优先级高于此属性中指定的值。Also, event-related considerations such as an active drag, mouse capture, text editing modes within controls, and so on, will also affect the cursor with higher priority than the value you specify in this property. 若要恢复的此属性设置为最终的默认行为，请将其设置为`null`试。To revert the behavior of setting this property to the eventual default, set it to `null` again. `null`默认的真正含义的实际光标值确定此处延迟，并且应从其他地方获取。The `null` default really means that determination of the practical cursor value is deferred here and should be obtained from elsewhere. 如果没有来自任何源的编程值显示的默认光标，则光标[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序将是一个箭头。If presented without programmatic values from any source, the default cursor that is visually over a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] application will be an arrow. 但是，暂时性光标发生变化，未设置为元素时通过传递的值。However, the transient cursor changes are not set to the values of the elements when they are passed over. 属性将只报告非 null 值在其中它实际设置，例如通过代码或一种样式的情况下。The property will only report non null values in cases where it was actually set, for instance through code or a style. 每个移动的鼠标悬停[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序将引发事件。Each movement of the mouse over a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] application raises a event. 该事件将冒泡，并且在路由任何元素都有机会对事件进行处理，并将光标通过此事件的自变量的值设置。The event bubbles, and any element along the route has the opportunity to handle the event and to set the value of the cursor through the arguments of this event. 这是产生显而易见的光标，在大多数情况下的机制。This is the mechanism that produces the visually apparent cursor in most cases. 如果处理程序返回一个光标结果中，则事实事件进行处理，并且参数中有更改的值优先于的值属性在任何级别，除非设置。If a handler returns a cursor result, then the fact that the event is handled and has a changed value in the arguments takes precedence over the value of the property at any level, unless is set. 如果不创建自定义光标，已将此属性通常设置为静态属性值类。If not are not creating a custom cursor, you typically set this property to a static property value of the class. 设置在代码中需要以下项之一：Setting in code requires one of the following: - 调用构造函数获取实例。Call the constructor to get a instance. 这两个签名构造函数使用的流或文件，为你创建的预期自定义光标对象。Both signatures of the constructor use streams or files, in anticipation that you are creating the object for a custom cursor. - 使用类并将其方法，以指定通过游标，或可以计算为字符串，并强制转换返回给。Use the class and its method to specify a cursor by , or a string that can evaluate to a , and cast the return to . 设置在部分信任环境中未启用为自定义值。Setting the to a custom value is not enabled in partial trust. 有关自定义的游标的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on custom cursors, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以有意设置光标图形。The following example shows how to deliberately set the cursor graphic. [!code-csharp[cursors#ChangeCursorsSample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/cursors/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#changecursorssample)] [!code-vb[cursors#ChangeCursorsSample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/cursors/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#changecursorssample)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ DataContext { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置元素参与数据绑定时的数据上下文。

span.span: Gets or sets the data context for an element when it participates in data binding.

value.span: 要用作数据上下文的对象。

span.span: The object to use as data context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *数据上下文*是使元素可以信息从其父元素继承有关用于绑定，以及绑定，如路径的其他特征的数据源的概念。*Data context* is a concept that allows elements to inherit information from their parent elements about the data source that is used for binding, as well as other characteristics of the binding, such as the path. 可以直接设置数据上下文[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]对象，并且将绑定到该对象的属性计算。Data context can be set directly to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] object, with the bindings evaluating to properties of that object. 或者，可以设置的数据上下文为对象。Alternatively, you can set the data context to a object. 此依赖属性继承属性值。This dependency property inherits property values. 如果无需为其他值的子元素建立通过本地值或样式，则属性系统将设置此值为分配有此值最接近的父元素的值。If there are child elements without other values for established through local values or styles, then the property system will set the value to be the value of the nearest parent element with this value assigned. 或者，你可以使用的以下属性之一类显式指定绑定源： ， ，或。Alternatively, you can use one of the following properties of the class to specify the binding source explicitly: , , or . 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 指定绑定源](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md)。For more information, see [How to: Specify the Binding Source](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-specify-the-binding-source.md). 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，最通常设置为声明。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], is most typically set to as a declaration. 你可以使用属性元素语法或特性语法。You can use either property element syntax or attribute syntax. 特性语法在此页上的示例所示。Attribute syntax is shown in the example on this page. 你还可以使用代码设置。You can also use code to set . 是可绑定的属性，以便于可能会将一个上下文绑定到另一个方案。 is a bindable property, to facilitate scenarios where one context might be bound to another. 但是，如果你将绑定到，小心地将其创建循环绑定引用 (不是将绑定为本身，这是可以执行的属性值继承性质，因此属性)。However, if you bind to , be careful to not create circular binding references (do not bind a to itself, which is possible to do because of the property value inheritance nature of the property). ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 在此元素的数据上下文更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the data context for this element changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据上下文和数据绑定的说明，请参阅[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For an explanation of data contexts and data binding, see [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 当元素更改，此元素上的所有数据绑定属性可能会受到都影响。When the for an element changes, all data-bound properties on this element are potentially affected. 这适用于任何子元素的逻辑树中中的当前元素继承的数据上下文，以及当前元素本身。This applies to any elements that are child elements of the current element in the logical tree, which inherit the data context, and also the current element itself. 此类的所有现有绑定必须重新解释新并将重新计算绑定结果。All such existing bindings must re-interpret the new and will reevaluate the binding results. 数据绑定引擎并不是有关这些重新计算，相对于引发的顺序确定事件。The data binding engine is not deterministic about the order of these reevaluations, relative to the raising of the event. 事件发生后, 或在任意组合，该事件前, 可以出现重新计算。The reevaluations can occur before the event, after the event, or in any mixture.

summary.span: 获取或设置在使用或定义主题样式时要用于引用此控件样式的键。

span.span: Gets or sets the key to use to reference the style for this control, when theme styles are used or defined.

value.span: 样式键。

span.span: The style key.

value.span: 要作为主题样式查找的一部分正常工作，此值应是带样式的控件的 。

span.span: To work correctly as part of theme style lookup, this value is expected to be the of the control being styled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常不通过其直接属性访问器的任何设置。This property is typically not set through any of its direct property accessors. 相反，替代此依赖项属性的特定类型的元数据，每次创建一个新派生类。Instead, you override the type-specific metadata of this dependency property every time you create a new derived class. 当派生的控件时，调用方法依据在控件的静态构造函数内的标识符，派生类 （或等效的类初始化）。When you derive a control, call the method against the identifier, within the static constructor of the control derived class (or equivalent class initialization). 通常，控件重写其自己的类型，此属性的默认值，但在某些情况下无法也使用的基类型存在主题字典中的样式。A control typically overrides the default value of this property to be its own type, but in some cases could also use a base type for which a style in the theme dictionaries exists. 如果基控件的控件模板完全定义的可视表示形式该派生，并且派生的类型公开的任何其他成员不需要的其他元素的控件模板的一部分，这是控件的仅可行的。This is only practical if the control templates of the base control entirely define the visual representation of that derived control, and if whatever additional members the derived types expose do not require additional elements as part of the control template. 如果你希望元素或控件，以防出现故意不使用主题样式，设置属性`true`。If you want your element or control to deliberately not use theme styles, set the property to `true`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示在备注中讨论的依赖项属性元数据重写用法。The following example illustrates the dependency property metadata override usage discussed in Remarks. 此代码定义了一个自定义控件类`NumericUpDown`旨在从专用的控件库程序集一起使用。This code defines a custom control class `NumericUpDown` intended to be used from a dedicated control library assembly. 所述的静态构造函数引用某个私有初始化函数，注册类处理程序 (另一个常用的控件子类化方案，请参阅[标记作为 Handled，和类处理的路由事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)) 和最后重写上的依赖属性元数据`NumericUpDown`类。The illustrated static constructor references some private initialization function, registers a class handler (another common control subclassing scenario; see [Marking Routed Events as Handled, and Class Handling](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/marking-routed-events-as-handled-and-class-handling.md)) and finally overrides the dependency property metadata on the `NumericUpDown` class. 始终返回其自己的类型作为预期的键，即主题样式系统用以查找一些任意否则非风格的控件的样式的约定。 always returns its own type as the intended key, which is the convention that the theme style system uses to look up the style for some arbitrary otherwise non-styled control. 完整的示例还定义由该密钥; 引用的实际控件的主题样式请参阅[主题和 UI 自动化支持示例的 NumericUpDown 自定义控件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025)。The complete sample also defines the actual control's theme style that is referenced by that key; see [NumericUpDown Custom Control with Theme and UI Automation Support Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160025). [!code-csharp[CustomControlNumericUpDown#StaticCtorOfCustomClassCommonTasks](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/CustomControlLibrary/NumericUpDown.cs#staticctorofcustomclasscommontasks)] [!code-vb[CustomControlNumericUpDown#StaticCtorOfCustomClassCommonTasks](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDown/visualbasic/customcontrollibrary/numericupdown.vb#staticctorofcustomclasscommontasks)] [!code-csharp[CustomControlNumericUpDown#Close](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDown/CSharp/CustomControlLibrary/NumericUpDown.cs#close)] [!code-vb[CustomControlNumericUpDown#Close](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CustomControlNumericUpDown/visualbasic/customcontrollibrary/numericupdown.vb#close)]

summary.span: 指示元素的初始化过程已完成。

span.span: Indicates that the initialization process for the element is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果之前已调用，基实现将引发事件。If was previously called, the base implementation will raise the event. 否则为如果未调用或它无法确定是否调用，则不会引发并且改为引发异常。Otherwise, if was not called or it could not be determined whether was called, is not raised and an exception is thrown instead.

exception.span: 调用 之前尚未在元素上调用 。

span.span: was called without having previously been called on the element.

para.span: 实现此方法以提供您的元素将在元素中加载过程中初始化的对话框时应发生这种情况的特殊处理。

span.span: Implement this method to provide special handling that should happen when your element is initialized during the element loading process.

para.span: 您的实现应调用基实现，因为基 （默认） 实现设置某些内部标志来跟踪初始化。

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果找不到键调用此方法，将引发异常。If you call this method for a key that cannot be found, an exception is thrown. 如果您不想要处理的异常，导致调用，调用相反。If you do not want to handle exceptions that result from calling , call instead. 返回`null`请求的资源时无法找到，且不会引发异常。 returns `null` when a requested resource cannot be found, and does not throw an exception. 如果调用元素上未找到资源，逻辑树中的父元素是搜索的下一步，然后应用程序，然后主题和最后系统资源。If the resource is not found on the calling element, the parent element in the logical tree is searched next, then the application, then themes, and finally system resources. 这种查找方法等同于请求资源时在标记中的动态资源引用如何搜索树。This lookup methodology is identical to how the tree is searched if a resource were requested by a dynamic resource reference in markup. 有关资源查找的详细信息，请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information about resource lookup, see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). 通常情况下，你立即强制转换值到属性的类型，使你返回设置，并返回的资源值。Typically, you immediately cast a return value to the type of the property that you setting with the returned resource value. 资源键不一定是字符串。Resource keys are not necessarily strings. 例如，样式特意根据主题级别的控件的控件，并应用程序或页面的样式的控件通常使用此相同的键约定。For instance, styles for controls at the theme level are deliberately keyed to the of the control, and application or page styles for controls typically use this same key convention. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)或[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For details, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md) or [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). ## Examples 下面的示例获取的已命名的资源，并将其强制转换为适当类型以填充某个属性。The following example obtains a named resource and casts it to an appropriate type to fill a property. summary.span: 获取或设置文本和其他[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 元素在控制它们布局的任何父元素中的流动方向。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 依赖项属性的使用情况设置针对此元素。The dependency property usage sets the on this element. 由于属性值继承，设置在元素上可以可能在设置对未设置的所有子元素本地或通过其他方式如样式。Because of property value inheritance, setting on an element can potentially set on all child elements that did not set locally or though other means such as styles. 此属性是不自动设置作为一部分的任何应用程序的区域性信息，因为元素可能包含不一定是要遵循隐含的区域性信息的常规流方向的内容。This property is not automatically set as part of any application culture information, because an element might contain content that is not necessarily intended to obey the general flow direction implied by the culture information. 全球化注意事项的详细信息，请参阅[WPF 的全球化](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/globalization-for-wpf.md)。For more information on globalization considerations, see [Globalization for WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/globalization-for-wpf.md). 此属性具有已定义[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]属性访问器，使它作为依赖项属性。This property has a defined [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] property accessor, so it functions as a dependency property. 但是，它还注册为附加，因此它也可以作为附加的属性。However, it is also registered as attached, so it can also function as an attached property. 注册附加主要是为了支持属性值继承，但属性还可以用作真正的附加属性。The attached registration is mainly so that property value inheritance is supported, but the property can also be used as a true attached property. 附加的属性使用情况才是如果你想要将数据流方向设置上的对象具有相关执行它，为基础的布局的父元素不是本身，并且已没有更直接定义`FlowDirection`属性。The attached property usage is only relevant if the object you intend to set the flow direction on has a parent element that performs layout upon it, is itself not a , and does not already have a more directly defined `FlowDirection` property. (某些流如文档类和定义其自己`FlowDirection`，并且此属性还可以设置的流动方向。(Some of the flow document classes such as and define their own `FlowDirection`, and this property can also set the flow direction. 读取属性值然后最终内容主机而无需附加的属性使用情况。）The property value is then read by the eventual content host without requiring attached property usage.) ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **FlowDirection**=""/>\<*object* **FlowDirection**=""/> ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此外可以在类不设置此属性派生类中，通过以下[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]附加属性的用法：This property can also be set on classes that are not derived classes, by the following [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attached property usage: `<` *object* `FrameworkElement.`**FlowDirection**="`"/>``<` *object* `FrameworkElement.`**FlowDirection**="`"/>` ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , | 此属性是依赖项属性和一个附加的属性;请参阅备注。This property is both a dependency property and an attached property; see Remarks.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个属性，该属性允许自定义此元素在捕获到键盘焦点时要应用于此元素的外观、效果或其他样式特征。

span.span: Gets or sets a property that enables customization of appearance, effects, or other style characteristics that will apply to this element when it captures keyboard focus.

value.span: 要应用于焦点的所需样式。

span.span: The desired style to apply on focus.

value.span: 该依赖项属性中声明的默认值是一个空的静态 。

span.span: The default value as declared in the dependency property is an empty static .

value.span: 但是，运行时的有效值通常是（但并非总是）控件的主题支持所提供的样式。

span.span: However, the effective value at run time is often (but not always) a style as supplied by theme support for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性会影响视觉外观，但不会报告元数据中。This property affects visual appearance but does not report in metadata. 这是因为可视外观更改是事件驱动的和可能不适用于在所有时间，并因此通常不应该报告元数据中的任何 visual 或布局信息。This is because the visual appearance change is event-driven and may not apply at all times, and therefore should not generally report any visual or layout information in metadata. 从概念上讲，应用于控件的焦点的可视行为应为连贯控件间。Conceptually, the visual behavior of focus applied to a control should be coherent from control to control. 最合理的方法，来强制执行一致性是仅更改焦点视觉样式，如果你创建的整个主题。The most sensible way to enforce coherence is to only change the focus visual style if you are composing an entire theme. 将此属性设置单个控件样式上，而不是主题的一部分不是预期的用法的此属性，因为它可能会导致混乱的用户体验与键盘焦点有关。Setting this property on individual control styles and not as part of a theme is not the intended usage of this property, because it may lead to a confusing user experience regarding keyboard focus. 如果你想为以防出现故意不连贯整个主题的特定于控件的行为，较好的做法是使用触发器样式中的单个输入的状态属性，如或，从而不一种方法中执行此操作直观地干扰任何现有的焦点视觉样式。If you are intending control-specific behavior that is deliberately not coherent across a theme, a much better approach is to use triggers in styles for individual input state properties, such as or , and to do so in a way that does not visually interfere with any existing focus visual style. 有关详细信息的设计意图及替代焦点属性，请参阅[样式的焦点在控件和 FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md)。For more information on the design intention of and alternative focus properties, see [Styling for Focus in Controls, and FocusVisualStyle](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/styling-for-focus-in-controls-and-focusvisualstyle.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的模板[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]具有自包含的命名空间。Templates in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] have a self-contained namescope. 这是因为模板可以重复使用，并且当多个实例的每个控件实例化其模板，模板中定义的任何名称不能保持唯一。This is because templates are re-used, and any name defined in a template cannot remain unique when multiple instances of a control each instantiate its template. 调用方法返回对来自该模板后实例化的对象的引用。Call the method to return references to objects that come from the template after it is instantiated. 不能使用方法以查找模板中的项，因为以更通用作用域，并且没有之间没有连接类本身和实例化的模板后应用。You cannot use the method to find items from templates because acts in a more general scope, and there is no connection between the class itself and the instantiated template once it is applied. 提供此方法与相同的功能。 supplies the same function as this method. 而不是公共受保护，并使用正确允许其访问内部元素并查找名为其中的项的模板的名称范围的注意事项。 is public instead of protected, and it uses correct name-scoping considerations that allow it to access the template within an element and find named items within it. 使用何时需要获取其父控件外部元素的位置。Use when you need to get an element outside of its parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三个可写属性之一位于用于指定高度信息。 is one of three writable properties on that specify height information. 另外两个是和。The other two are and . 如果没有发生冲突这三个值，确定高度的实际的应用程序的顺序是： 首先必须采用，然后，最后，如果它是在限制之内， 。If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual height determination is that first must be honored, then , and finally, if it is within bounds, . 如果此元素是一个子元素在其他某个元素，然后将此属性设置为值实际上只有一个建议的值。If this element is a child element within some other element, then setting this property to a value is really only a suggested value. 布局系统，以及父元素的特定布局逻辑将使用值作为没有约束力的输入在布局过程。The layout system as well as the particular layout logic of the parent element will use the value as a nonbinding input during the layout process. 在实际情况下，几乎始终是也是如此。 的子元素，即使你设置上。In practical terms, a is almost always the child element of something else; even when you set the on . (有关，值时的基础的应用程序模型建立创建 Hwnd 的基本呈现假设使用托管的应用程序。)(For , that value is used when the underlying application model establishes the basic rendering assumptions that create the Hwnd that hosts the application.) 此外可接受值，此属性也可以是。In addition to acceptable values, this property can also be . 这是如何在代码中指定自动调整大小行为。This is how you specify auto sizing behavior in code. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]你设置的值为字符串"自动"（不区分大小写） 若要启用自动调整大小行为。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] you set the value to the string "Auto" (case insensitive) to enable the auto sizing behavior. 自动调整大小行为意味着元素将填满可用的高度。Auto sizing behavior implies that the element will fill the height available to it. 但是请注意，特定的控件通常提供通过将禁用自动调整大小行为，除非专门重新启用了其默认主题样式的默认值。Note however that specific controls frequently supply default values through their default theme styles that will disable the auto sizing behavior unless it is specifically re-enabled. 此属性的返回值始终是任何已设置为它的值相同。The return value of this property is always the same as any value that was set to it. 相反，值可能会有所不同。In contrast, the value of the may vary. 这种情况可能是静态因为布局出于某种原因，被拒绝的建议的大小也可能是暂时。This can happen either statically because the layout rejected the suggested size for some reason, or momentarily. 布局系统本身相对于属性系统以异步方式工作，可能不处理该特定的大小调整属性的更改。The layout system itself works asynchronously relative to the property system's set of and may not have processed that particular sizing property change yet. 对的值限制由强制执行值机制。The value restrictions on the value are enforced by a mechanism. 如果你尝试设置一个无效值，则会引发一个运行时异常。If you attempt to set an invalid value, a run-time exception is thrown. 除了验证检查，没有为具有不确定性上限值，由布局系统强制执行 (这是非常大的数，大于但小于)。In addition to the validation check, there is a nondeterministic upper value bound for that is enforced by the layout system (this is a very large number, larger than but smaller than ). 如果超过此限制，该元素将不会呈现，并不会引发异常。If you exceed this bound, the element will not render, and no exception is thrown. 未设置为远远大于任何可能的可视显示，或你的最大大小可能超出此非确定性上限值。Do not set to a value that is significantly larger than the maximum size of any possible visual display, or you may exceed this nondeterministic upper bound. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件将引发每当或调用方法。This event will be raised whenever the or methods are called. 对任何一种方法的调用可能会从应用程序代码或通过具有出现[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]处理器行为时[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]页进行处理。Calls to either method could have come from application code, or through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor behavior when a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] page is processed. 您选择是否处理或取决于你的要求。Whether you choose to handle or depends on your requirements. 如果不需要读取元素属性，想要重置属性，并且不需要任何布局的信息，可能是更好的事件执行操作。If you do not need to read element properties, intend to reset properties, and do not need any layout information, might be the better event to act upon. 如果您需要所有属性的元素可用，并且你将设置重置布局中，有可能的属性可能是更好的事件执行操作。If you need all properties of the element to be available, and you will be setting properties that are likely to reset the layout, might be the better event to act upon. 如果您的处理程序重置由布局系统，以表示新布局处理过程需要解释的任何属性，则请注意的重新进入。Be careful of reentrancy if your handler resets any properties that are interpreted by the layout system to mean that a new layout pass is required. (你可能需要检查上的属性，如果你不确定哪些属性可能需要新的布局的值传递更改时。)(You might need to check the values on the property if you are unsure of which properties can require a new layout pass if they are changed.) 有关序列的对象事件的详细信息，另一些相关应用程序和元素类，请参阅和[对象生存期事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md)。For more information about the sequence of object events for a , and also for several related application and element classes, see [Object Lifetime Events](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从新构造，此属性开始`false`，并保留`true`设置为之后`true`，即使随后移除元素从连接的逻辑树的代码。From a newly constructed , this property starts off `false`, and remains `true` after it is set to `true`, even if the element is subsequently removed from a connected logical tree by code. `true` 元素加载到演示文稿引擎时，将按常规表示逻辑设置状态。`true` state is set by the general presentation logic when elements are loaded into the presentation engine. 通常，已加载的元素都是呈现出来，但并非所有派生的类具有一个演示文稿和其他属性，如可能影响表示形式。Typically, loaded elements are rendered, but not all derived classes have a presentation, and other properties such as can influence presentation. ## Examples 下面的示例实现两个处理程序： 一个处理的根元素，从而可以确定，因为它是事件的意义加载页面根元素的事件。The following example implements two handlers: one is handling the event of the root element, so it is certain that the page root element is loaded because that is the significance of the event. 另一个处理程序挂钩到一个用户控件，并且调用以确保根元素是加载完全。The other handler is hooked to a user control, and calls to assure that the root element is loaded completely. 这两个处理程序调用相同函数 （未显示），将填充并用新数据的子元素。Both handlers call the same function (not shown) that will populate child elements with fresh data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 与此相反，将影响布局的结果。In contrast to , will affect results of layout. 设置一个转换，可提供强大的功能的缩放和旋转。Setting a transform provides powerful capabilities of scaling and rotating. 但是，忽略操作。However, ignores operations. 这是因为子元素的布局系统行为自动更正任何偏移量到布局的缩放或旋转元素的位置和父元素的坐标系统。This is because the layout system behavior for child elements of a auto-corrects any offsets to the position of a scaled or rotated element into the layout and coordinate system of the parent element. 可能导致不佳的应用程序性能，如果在方案中，不需要该布局系统的全面处理过程中调用它。 can lead to poor application performance if you invoke it in a scenario that does not require a full pass by the layout system. 当你将到集合，它将触发一个新的传递布局系统和强制屏幕上的所有对象重新度量和重新排列。When you apply a to the collection of the , it triggers a new pass by the layout system and forces all on-screen objects to be remeasured and rearranged. 如果你要更新完整的应用程序[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，此功能可能有且仅你的需要。If you are updating the complete application [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], this functionality might be exactly what you need. 但是，如果不需要完整的布局处理过程，使用属性，而不会调用该布局系统，因此，通常是更好的选择对于此方案。However, if you do not need a full layout pass, use the property, which does not invoke the layout system, and therefore, is typically a better choice for this scenario. 示例方案其中会有用包括： 旋转元素菜单组件从水平方向为垂直或者反之亦然，如缩放 （放大） 的元素上焦点时，提供编辑行为，等等。Example scenarios where would be useful include: rotating elements such as menu components from horizontal to vertical or vice versa, scaling elements (zooming in) on focus, providing editing behavior, etc. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用的元素。The following example shows how to apply a to an element. 该示例创建的实例并将它宿主在父。The example creates an instance of and hosts it within a parent . 它还使用属性，将应用到。It also uses the property to apply a to the . [!code-cpp[LayoutTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LayoutTransform/CPP/LayoutTransform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LayoutTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LayoutTransform/CSharp/LayoutTransform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LayoutTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LayoutTransform/VisualBasic/LayoutTransform.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[LayoutTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LayoutTransform/XAML/default.xaml#1)]

summary.span: 当对元素进行布局、呈现，且可将其用于交互时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the element is laid out, rendered, and ready for interaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常的最后一个事件中引发元素初始化序列。 is usually the last event raised in an element initialization sequence. 始终将后引发。It will always be raised after . 您选择是否处理或取决于你的要求。Whether you choose to handle or depends on your requirements. 如果不需要读取元素属性，想要重置属性，并且不需要任何布局的信息，可能是更好的事件执行操作。If you do not need to read element properties, intend to reset properties, and do not need any layout information, might be the better event to act upon. 如果您需要所有属性的元素可用，并且你将设置重置布局中，有可能的属性可能是更好的事件执行操作。If you need all properties of the element to be available, and you will be setting properties that are likely to reset the layout, might be the better event to act upon. 如果您的处理程序重置由布局系统，以表示新布局处理过程需要解释的任何属性，则请注意的重新进入。Be careful of reentrancy if your handler resets any properties that are interpreted by the layout system to mean that a new layout pass is required. (你可能需要检查上的属性，如果你不确定哪些属性可能需要新的布局的值传递更改时。)(You might need to check the values on the property if you are unsure of which properties can require a new layout pass if they are changed.) 有关序列的对象事件的详细信息，另一些相关应用程序和元素类，请参阅和[对象生存期事件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md)。For more information about the sequence of object events for a , and also for several related application and element classes, see [Object Lifetime Events](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/object-lifetime-events.md). 直接路由的事件不遵循路由，而仅处理引发它们时对同一元素中。Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised. 直接路由的事件是否支持其他路由的事件行为： 它们支持的可访问的处理程序集合，并可用作样式。Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an in a style. 和可能同时会引发在用户启动的系统主题更改控件上。 and might both be raised on controls as a result of user-initiated system theme changes. 主题更改会导致控件模板和包含的可视化树，这反过来会导致整个控件，若要卸载并重新加载的失效。A theme change causes an invalidation of the control template and the contained visual tree, which in turn causes the entire control to unload and reload. 因此无法假定发生仅当页面首次加载通过导航到页。Therefore cannot be assumed to occur only when a page is first loaded through navigation to the page. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在注册路由事件时创建路由事件标识符。Routed event identifiers are created when routed events are registered. 这些标识符包含标识名称、所有者类型、处理程序类型、路由策略和、添加事件所有者的实用程序方法。These identifiers contain an identifying name, owner type, handler type, routing strategy, and utility method for adding owners for the event. 可以使用这些标识符添加类处理程序。You can use these identifiers to add class handlers. 有关注册路由事件的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about registering routed events, see . 有关使用路由事件标识符添加类处理程序的更多信息，请参见 。For more information about using routed event identifiers to add class handlers, see .

value.span: 默认值是所有属性都等于 0（零）的 。

span.span: The default value is a with all properties equal to 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 边距是此元素与布局创建时，将相邻其他元素之间的空间[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。The margin is the space between this element and other elements that will be adjacent when layout creates the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. 共享的元素可能是对等元素 （如公共的父控件的集合中的其他元素），或者也可能是此元素的父级。Shared elements might be peer elements (such as other elements in the collection of a common parent control), or might also be this element's parent. 设置为结构而不是数字的形式，以便非对称设置边距。 is set as a structure rather than as a number so that the margin can be set asymmetrically. 结构本身支持字符串类型转换，以便你可以指定非对称中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]还属性语法。The structure itself supports string type conversion so that you can specify an asymmetric in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute syntax also. 非零边距适用元素布局的外部空间和。A non-zero margin applies space outside the element layout's and . 边距的同级元素在布局中; 累加性例如，它们都具有边距为 30 相连的边缘设置的两个相邻元素将具有 60 之间的距离单位。Margins are additive for sibling elements in a layout; for example, two adjacent elements both with a margin of 30 set on the adjoining edge would have 60 units of space between them. 不会设置边距的元素将通常限制指定的大小分配的矩形空间是否不足够大小以容纳边距加上元素的内容区域。Elements that have margins set will not typically constrain the size of the specified if the allotted rectangle space is not large enough for the margin plus the element content area. 计算布局时，将改为约束元素内容区域。The element content area will be constrained instead when layout is calculated. 唯一的情形进行约束边距也是如果内容已被约束到零。The only case where margins would be constrained also is if the content is already constrained all the way to zero. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将替代连接的 WPF 核心级别和 WPF 框架级别布局度量值实现。This method overrides to connect the WPF core-level and WPF framework-level layout measure implementations. 实现会对该方法。The implementation seals the method. 若要调整的 WPF 框架级别生成任何元素的度量传递布局行为，重写相反。To adjust the measure pass layout behavior of any element that builds on the WPF framework-level, override instead. 若要调整度量值，将传递以防出现故意不会在 WPF 框架级别上生成或使用的元素的布局行为，重写。To adjust the measure pass layout behavior of an element that deliberately does not build on the WPF framework-level or use , override .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Size MeasureOverride(valuetype System.Windows.Size availableSize) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function MeasureOverride (availableSize As Size) As Size

param.name: availableSize
param.span: 此元素可提供给子元素的可用大小。

span.span: The available size that this element can give to child elements.

param.span: 可指定无穷大作为一个值，该值指示元素将调整到适应内容的大小。

span.span: Infinity can be specified as a value to indicate that the element will size to whatever content is available.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，请测量子元素在布局中所需的大小，然后确定 派生类的大小。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, measures the size in layout required for child elements and determines a size for the -derived class.

returns.span: 此元素基于其对子元素大小的计算确定它在布局期间所需要的大小。

span.span: The size that this element determines it needs during layout, based on its calculations of child element sizes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写实现您的元素的自定义布局大小调整行为参与[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]布局系统。Override to implement custom layout sizing behavior for your element as it participates in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] layout system. 您的实现应执行以下操作：Your implementation should do the following: 1. 循环的布局，调用的一部分的子级的元素的特定集合每个子元素上。Iterate your element's particular collection of children that are part of layout, call on each child element. 2. 立即获取对子 (这将设置为一个属性后称为)。Immediately get on the child (this is set as a property after is called). 3. 计算所需的基于测量到的子元素的父净大小。Compute the net desired size of the parent based upon the measurement of the child elements. 返回值应为元素自身的所需大小，随后将成为当前元素的父元素的输入的度量值。The return value of should be the element's own desired size, which then becomes the measure input for the parent element of the current element. 这一过程继续通过该布局系统，直到达到页的根元素。This same process continues through the layout system until the root element of the page is reached. 在此过程中，子元素可能会返回较大大小大于初始`availableSize`指示子元素想更多空间。During this process, child elements might return a larger size than the initial `availableSize` to indicate that the child element wants more space. 引入了可滚动区域，在调整父控件中，通过某种方式堆叠顺序或任意数量的解决方案来测量或排列内容，可能会在您自己的实现中处理此。This might be handled in your own implementation by introducing a scrollable region, by resizing the parent control, by establishing some manner of stacked order, or any number of solutions for measuring or arranging content. > [!IMPORTANT] > 元素应调用在每个在此过程中的子活动，否则为子元素不会正确调整大小或排列。Elements should call on each child during this process, otherwise the child elements will not be correctly sized or arranged.

block.para:

The property can be named anything.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的最常见用法是指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]作为标记中的属性的元素名称。The most common usage of this property is to specify a 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)。This property essentially provides a WPF framework-level convenience property to set the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md). 名称必须是唯一名称范围内。Names must be unique within a namescope. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md). 获取如果你正在使用中的元素的代码不常见。Getting a if you are creating elements in code is not common. 如果你已在代码中具有适当的引用，你可以直接调用方法和属性的元素上引用通常并不需要。If you have the appropriate reference in code already, you can just call methods and properties on the element reference and will not generally need the . 与此例外情况是如果字符串具有某些重载的含义，例如有用中显示该名称是否[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。An exception to this is if the string has some overloaded meaning, for instance if it is useful to display that name in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 设置从代码隐藏如果原始从标记中设置也不建议，并且在加载后更改的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]将不会更改原始对象引用。Setting a from code-behind if the original was set from markup is also not recommended, and changing the property after loading the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will not change the original object reference. 仅当在分析过程中显式创建了基础名称范围创建的对象引用。The object references are created only when the underlying namescopes are explicitly created during parsing. 你必须明确调用以进行到有效的更改已加载的元素的属性。You must specifically call to make an effective change to the property of an already loaded element. 一个值得一提设置情况从代码很重要时，可以注册名称元素演示图板将运行针对，以便可以在运行时引用它们。One notable case where setting from code is important is when registering names for elements that storyboards will run against, so that they can be referenced at run time. 你可以注册名称之前，可能还需要实例化并分配实例。Before you can register a name, might also need to instantiate and assign a instance. 请参阅示例部分中，或[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。See the Example section, or [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). 设置代码中具有有限的应用程序，但获取的元素更为常见。Setting from code has limited applications, but getting an element by is more common. not necessarily code-behind defined for that page. 实用工具方法，这是可从任何，可以找到任何元素在该元素的逻辑树中，根据需要树递归搜索。The utility method , which is available from any , can find any element by in the logical tree for that element, searching the tree recursively as necessary. 也可以使用静态方法，其还会作为自变量的字符串。Or you can use the static method of , which also takes a string as an argument. 通常使用的根元素 (，例如) 实现的接口。Typically used root elements (, for example) implement the interface . 此接口的实现需要强制该名称是明确在其范围内。Implementations of this interface are expected to enforce that names be unambiguous within their scope. 定义此接口的根元素还为所有定义的名称范围行为边界相关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]。The root elements that define this interface also define the namescope behavior boundaries for all the related [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]. 属性也可作为其他进程的标识符。The property also serves as an identifier for other processes. 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]自动化模型将使用作为客户端和提供程序的 AutomationId。For instance, the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation model will use as the AutomationId for clients and providers. 所使用的字符串值有如基础施加一些限制， [X:name 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md)由定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]规范。The string values used for have some restrictions, as imposed by the underlying [x:Name Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-name-directive.md) defined by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] specification. 最值得注意的是，必须以字母或下划线字符 (_) 开头，并且必须包含字母、 数字或下划线。Most notably, a must start with a letter or the underscore character (_), and must contain only letters, digits, or underscores. 有关详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md). 是不能进行动画处理的极少数依赖项属性之一 (是`true`元数据中)，因为名称本身是所必需的定位动画。 is one of the very few dependency properties that cannot be animated ( is `true` in metadata), because the name itself is vital for targeting an animation. of the property: to provide an identifier connection point for code-behind. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to summary.span: 在派生类中重写后，每当应用程序代码或内部进程调用 ，都将调用此方法。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, is invoked whenever application code or internal processes call .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 模板是来自模板属性的元素的已完成可视化树部分元素被应用。Templates are the section of an element's completed visual tree that comes from the Template property of a that is applied for the element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式设置和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md).

block.para:
派生类的可以使用此方法作为通知的各种可能的方案：
Derived classes of can use this method as a notification for a variety of possible scenarios:
- 你可以调用生成的元素的可视化树的其余部分的代码的实现。You can call your own implementation of code that builds the remainder of an element visual tree.
- 你可以运行依赖于从例如获取对来自模板的命名元素的引用，已应用的模板的可视化树的代码。You can run code that relies on the visual tree from templates having been applied, such as obtaining references to named elements that came from a template.
- 你可以引进仅存在意义模板中的可视化树完成后的服务。You can introduce services that only make sense to exist after the visual tree from templates is complete.
- 你可以设置状态和依赖于其他因素的模板中的元素的属性。You can set states and properties of elements within the template that are dependent on other factors.例如，属性值可能仅可检测到通过了解父元素中，或当特定派生类将使用常见的模板。For instance, property values might only be discoverable by knowing the parent element, or when a specific derived class uses a common template.实施者应始终调用之前自己的实现的基实现。Implementers should always call the base implementation before their own implementation. 本身不具有默认实现中，但插入类可能。 itself has no default implementation, but intervening classes might. 提供了类似的重写。 offers a similar override, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

summary.span: 每当未处理的 事件在其路由中到达此元素时调用。

span.span: Invoked whenever an unhandled event reaches this element in its route.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与一些其他不同 \* 公开由基元素方法确实具有的默认实现。Unlike some other On\* methods exposed by the base elements, does have a default implementation. 具体而言，它具有重写下的 null 实现基元素的下一步级别中实现。Specifically, it has an implementation that overrides the null implementation in the next level of base element down, . 调用时，在事件生成由于键盘焦点的当前元素的位置的情况下此元素上设置相应的焦点行为。When invoked, sets appropriate focus behavior on this element in cases where the event originated from the current element due to keyboard focus. 处理程序不会标记为已处理，甚至焦点设置到当前元素的事件自变量。The handler does not mark the event arguments as handled, even when focus is set to the current element. 如果事件的源树 （不是当前元素） 中的另一个元素，该处理程序将没有任何影响。If the event's source was another element in the tree (not the current element), the handler does nothing. 你可以重写此方法，以更改您的元素上的默认焦点行为，但请注意，更改焦点行为以这种方式可能更好地完成通过不允许要在所有可获得焦点的元素 (请参阅)。You can override this method in order to change the default focus behavior on your element, but be aware that changing focus behavior in this way might be better accomplished by not allowing the element to be focusable at all (see ).

para.span: 如果你想要将自变量中处理该事件标记，应该注意的其他元素树中的父元素中处理事件的后果。

span.span: If you intend to mark the event handled in the arguments, you should be aware of consequences on event handling in other parent elements in the element tree.

para.span: 这是因为此处理程序操作的事件使用冒泡路由，则将焦点设置到当前每个事件自变量可能不合适。

span.span: Because this handler acts on an event with a bubbling routing, setting the focus to the current per the event arguments may not be appropriate.

para.span: 焦点可能需要转到复合的子元素或父元素，具体取决于某些控件的组合。

span.span: Focus might need to go to either a composite child element or to a parent element, depending on the compositing of certain controls.

para.span: 如果通过路由事件的可视化树整个属于你创作的控件的组合，则仅建议因此将焦点事件标记为已处理。

span.span: Therefore marking a focus event as handled is only recommended if the entirety of the visual tree that the event is routing through is part of compositing of a control that you authored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此特定 \* 方法不是类处理程序挂钩。This particular On\* method is not a class handler hook. 也不它完全遵循以下建立[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上 \* 无法通过重写此方法，而不调用基实现禁用匹配的事件的方法约定。Nor does it exactly follow the established [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] On\* method convention that the matching event could be suppressed by overriding this method and not calling the base implementation. 请注意，属性是只读的因此你不能设置为强制初始化行为。Note that the property is read-only, so you cannot set to force initialization behavior. 设置初始化状态旨在只能由[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]framework。Setting the initialization state is intended to be done only by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] framework.

span.span: Overrides should call the base implementation to preserve this behavior.

para.span: 如果您不能调用基实现，不仅你不会引发事件按通常的预期派生类，但也将取消显示两个重要样式和主题样式初始化的操作实现此基实现。

span.span: If you fail to call the base implementation, not only will you not raise the event as is generally expected of a derived class, but you will also suppress two important style and theme style initialization operations that are implemented by this base implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应通常检测属性更改或失效。This method is not intended to generally detect property changes or invalidations. 它而被旨在用于修改常规失效模式如果查阅宽分类的属性已知的某些信息。It is instead intended for modifications of the general invalidation pattern if certain information is known about wide classifications of properties. 调用此方法可能很多时候一个对象的生命周期内。This method is potentially invoked many times during the life of an object. 因此，你可以实现更好的性能，如果重写特定属性的元数据，然后将附加或为各个属性的函数。Therefore, you can achieve better performance if you override the metadata of specific properties and then attach or functions for individual properties. 但是，如果你将使用此方法包括大量的值相关的依赖项属性，或如果它包括逻辑，如呈现行为，必须重新运行多个相关属性失效的情况。However, you would use this method if a includes a significant number of value-interrelated dependency properties, or if it includes logic such as rendering behavior that must be rerun for several related cases of property invalidations. 请注意，没有具有相同名称`OnPropertyChanged`用不同的签名的方法 (该参数类型是)，可能出现在多个类。Note that there is an identically named `OnPropertyChanged` method with a different signature (the parameter type is ) that can appear on a number of classes. `OnPropertyChanged`用于数据对象通知，并且是协定的一部分。That `OnPropertyChanged` is used for data object notifications, and is part of the contract for .

para.span: 始终调用基实现中，为您的实现中的第一个操作。

span.span: Always call the base implementation, as the first operation in your implementation.

para.span: 如果不这样做将显著禁用整个[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统，这会导致不正确的值进行报告。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不具有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 继承中的中间类已经实现此方法的情况下，你仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的是某种程度上类似于[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]上的事件模式 \* 方法： 它提供了一种用而不是一个实例处理程序的类处理程序的派生类中对匹配事件进行处理。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下匹配的事件是路由的事件。In this case the matching event is a routed event. On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的路由事件，因为路由的事件可能遭到一个子元素，不一定的元素，将会调用处理程序，以便您的实现将需要采取的事件自变量的源引发将属性转换为帐户 （和不应尝试再次引发该事件在大多数情况下）。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event may have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 子类可以选择在路由过程中收到事件时调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could choose to call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一个可能的方案是事件的自变量，以防出现故意将事件标记为已处理以缩短路由。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled to shorten the route.
