remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的最常见用法是一种间接使用正提供主题样式的样式的 setter 中。The most common usage of this property is an indirect usage within the setter of a style that is supplying a themed style. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果你设置到`true`控件，则会禁用主题样式所提供的默认控件模板。If you set to `true` on a control, you will be suppressing the default control template supplied by the theme styles. 该控件模板通常包含内容的显示器和提供基本其他复合元素[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]功能和控件的可视化效果。That control template typically includes the content presenter and other composited elements that provide basic [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] functionality and visualization for the control. 如果你想要继续支持与默认主题样式相同的功能的控件，你必须提供替代样式与复制相同的结构的控件模板。If you want the control to continue to support the same features as the default theme styles, you must supply an alternate style with a control template that replicates the same structure. 有关详细信息，请参阅[控件创作概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md)。For more information, see [Control Authoring Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-authoring-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此元素具有子元素在其某些属性已失效，并且该属性被标记为或在注册期间的属性元数据，会调用此方法。If this element has a child element on which some property was invalidated and the property was marked as or in property metadata during registration, this method is invoked. 方法调用将通知的特定子元素必须是重新测量，如果此元素支持部分 （增量） 更新的布局的父元素。The method invocation notifies the parent element which particular child element must be re-measured if this element supports partial (incremental) update of layout. 默认情况下，不支持增量布局，然后在这类方法具有没有默认实现。By default, does not support incremental layout, and in the class this method has no default implementation. 将需要重写此方法的方案并不常用，因为它需要修改默认布局系统行为。The scenario where overriding this method would be necessary is not common, because it requires you to modify the default layout system behavior. 一个实现方案示例可能是一个类包含可能存在的子元素的显著比 WPF 框架级别布局系统限制性更强的类型限制。An example implementation scenario might be if a class had type limitations for possible child elements that are significantly more restrictive than the WPF framework-level layout system. 由于这些自定义元素的特性，可能有意推迟属性更改时实现一些自定义布局的行为。Because of the nature of these custom elements, property changes could be deliberately deferred when you implement some custom layout behavior. 例如，/排列度量值的方法重写，则尝试优化子元素呈现处理过程，可能对某些类型的更改通常会生成另一个布局处理过程中被推迟。For instance, measure/arrange method overrides, which try to optimize the child element render pass, could be deferred for certain types of changes that would ordinarily result in another layout pass.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是调用的便捷方法。This method is a convenience method for calling . 该实现将检查连续的父元素，直到它找到适用实现，它可以通过查找元素实现。The implementation will check successive parent elements until it finds the applicable implementation, which is found by finding an element that implements . 有关名称范围的详细信息，请参阅[WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md)。For more information about namescopes, see [WPF XAML Namescopes](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/wpf-xaml-namescopes.md). 调用为正确挂钩的应用程序时在代码中创建动画演示图板是必需的。Calling is necessary in order to correctly hook up animation storyboards for applications when created in code. 这是因为其中一个主要情节提要属性， ，而不是能够充分目标元素的引用中使用运行时名称查找。This is because one of the key storyboard properties, , uses a run-time name lookup instead of being able to take a reference to a target element. 即使该元素是可访问的代码中的引用，也是如此。This is true even if that element is accessible by reference from the code. 为何需要注册名称的情节提要目标的详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information on why you need to register names for storyboard targets, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#NameScopeExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/CSharp/ScopeExample.cs#namescopeexample)] [!code-vb[StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip#NameScopeExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StoryboardBeginAnimation_procedural_snip/visualbasic/scopeexample.vb#namescopeexample)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法用于实现的上表示逻辑子级的元素的对象的集合。Use this method for the implementation of collections on objects that represent logical children of an element. 属性 getter 或 setter 中的类处理程序可以采取这`Changed`事件、 构造函数，或在集合类型本身。This might be done in property getters or setters, class handlers of `Changed` events, constructors, or within the collection types themselves. 对于控件作者操作在此级别的逻辑树不是建议的做法，除非没有合适的提供基控件类的内容模型。For control authors, manipulating the logical tree at this level is not the recommended practice, unless none of the provided base control class' content models are appropriate. 请考虑级别的子类化， ，和。Consider subclassing at the level of , , and . 这些类提供的内容模型通过专用的逻辑子级的特定强制[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)]，以及对其他功能中通常所需的支持[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]控件如通过模板的样式。These classes provide a content model with particular enforcement of logical children through dedicated [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_api#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-apisharpplural-md.md)], as well as support for other features typically desirable in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] control such as styling through templates. ## Examples 下面的示例实现`Child`的自定义属性执行其自己的可视化层实现。The following example implements a `Child` property on a custom that does its own visual layer implementation. 属性的 setter 的设计目的，因此如果值发生更改，从逻辑树中，以及特定于类的可视集合中删除旧值。The property's setter is designed so that if the value changes, the old value is removed from the logical tree, as well as a class-specific visual collection. 将缓存这些值，并随后将新值添加到标准 WPF 框架级别逻辑树和自定义的可视集合。The values are cached, and then the new value is added to both the standard WPF framework level logical tree and the custom visual collection. [!code-csharp[CompositionTargetRenderingAnimations#AddRemoveLogicalChild](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CompositionTargetRenderingAnimations/CSharp/ParticleEffectExamples/OverlayRenderDecorator.cs#addremovelogicalchild)] [!code-vb[CompositionTargetRenderingAnimations#AddRemoveLogicalChild](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CompositionTargetRenderingAnimations/visualbasic/particleeffectexamples/overlayrenderdecorator.vb#addremovelogicalchild)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以完全或部分中定义的资源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通常创建为一个属性元素，并且通常是根元素为任何单个页面或应用程序上。Resource dictionaries that can be defined completely or partially in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] are typically created as a property element, and are typically on the root element for any individual page or for the application. 将在此级别的资源字典便于查找从页面中的各个子元素 （或任何页上，在应用程序的情况下）。Placing the resource dictionary at this level makes it easier to find from individual child elements in the page (or from any page, in the application case). 在大多数应用程序方案中，我们建议作为对象元素使用的资源字典中定义样式或作为外部资源定义整个样式资源可以是自包含 （此方法有助于单独的设计器从开发人员通过将需要编辑物理文件分开的责任职责）。In most application scenarios, we recommend that styles be defined as object elements within a resource dictionary, or be defined as external resources so that the entire style resource can be self-contained (this approach helps separate designer responsibilities from developer responsibilities by separating the physical files that need to be edited). 请注意，此属性返回直接在该元素内声明仅的资源字典。Note that this property returns only the resource dictionary declared directly within that element. 此函数不同于实际资源查找过程中，子元素可以访问任何向上递归搜索每个父元素中定义的资源。This is different than the actual resource lookup process, where a child element can access any of the resources defined in each parent element, searching recursively upwards. 资源在集合中，从代码也可以引用，但请注意资源创建在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]肯定不可访问，直到引起声明该字典的元素。Resources can also be referenced by code from within the collection, but be aware that resources created in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will definitely not be accessible until after is raised by the element that declares the dictionary. 以异步方式而不分析资源的实际上，即使事件是保证可引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义资源。In fact, resources are parsed asynchronously and not even the event is an assurance that you can reference a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resource. 因此你通常只应访问[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]定义资源作为的一部分运行时代码，或通过其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]技术，如样式或特性值的资源扩展引用。For this reason you should generally only access [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] defined resources as part of run-time code, or through other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] techniques such as styles or resource extension references for attribute values. 通过代码访问资源时，它是实质上等同于从进行的引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。When you access resources through code, it is essentially equivalent to a reference made from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 基础支持添加、 删除或通过使用代码查询从集合中的资源所需的方法。The underlying supports the methods required to add, remove or query resources from within the collection by using code. 属性是可以设置以支持以下场景： 完全替换的元素为一个新的或不同的资源集合。The property is settable to support the scenario of completely replacing the resources collection of an element to be a new or different . 请注意，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]所示的语法不包含的元素。Notice that the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax shown does not include an element for the . 这是隐式集合语法; 一个示例可以省略表示集合元素的标记。This is an example of implicit collection syntax; a tag representing the collection element can be omitted. 改为指定为项添加到集合的元素。The elements that are added as items to the collection are specified instead. 有关隐式集合的详细信息和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，请参阅[在详细信息的 XAML 语法](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For more information about implicit collections and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 一种情况下其中仍显式指定引入合并的字典，这种情况下是否存在通常没有子元素，该元素原样。One case where a is still specified explicitly as an element is if you are introducing a merged dictionary, in which case there are typically no child elements for that . 有关详细信息，请参阅[合并资源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。For details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md). ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreResourceElements**oneOrMoreResourceElements* 一个或多个对象元素，其中每个定义的资源。One or more object elements, each of which defines a resource. 在每个每个资源属性元素必须具有唯一值[X:key 指令](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)，它用作唯一键时将从检索值。Each resource property element within each must have a unique value for the [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md), which serves as the unique key when values are retrieved from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直接路由的事件不遵循路由，而仅处理引发它们时对同一元素中。Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised. 直接路由的事件是否支持其他路由的事件行为： 它们支持的可访问的处理程序集合，并可用作样式。Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an in a style. 布局系统读取属性内的自变量类的此事件，以确定是否应将报告的大小更改视为重要。The layout system reads properties within the argument class of this event, to determine whether the reported size changes should be considered significant. 这允许该布局系统或自己的特定于控件的布局实现不会强制执行布局更改由于直观地无法觉察旧和新的高度或宽度值之间的差异。This allows the layout system or your control-specific layout implementations to avoid forcing a layout change due to visually imperceptible differences between old and new height or width values. 无法觉察的差异可能是由于舍入或相同的结果计算的浮点数据类型。The imperceptible differences might be due to rounding or same-result calculations of a floating-point data types. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate||

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Style ^ Style { System::Windows::Style ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Style ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置此元素呈现时所使用的样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the style used by this element when it is rendered.

value.span: 若存在，则为此元素适用的非默认样式。

span.span: The applied, nondefault style for the element, if present.

value.span: 否则为 。

span.span: Otherwise, .

value.span: 默认情况下构造的 的默认值为 。

span.span: The default for a default-constructed is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于控件，当前的样式是通常由控件主题中的默认样式或从样式通常应用于该类型的控件在页面或应用程序级别 （隐式样式） 的资源。For controls, the current style is often provided by a default style from control theming, or from styles generally applied to controls of that type by resources at page or application level (an implicit style). 此属性不未设置或返回默认值 （主题） 样式，但它返回隐式样式或对元素执行显式样式。This property does not set or return default (theme) styles, but it does return either an implicit style or an explicit style that is acting on the element. 如果存在隐式或显式样式，它并不重要的样式是指定为资源还是本地定义。In the case of implicit or explicit styles, it does not matter whether the style is specified as a resource or defined locally. 设置样式有一些限制。Setting the styles has some restrictions. 你可以重置整个到新的属性任何时候，这将强制布局重新组合。You can reset the entire property to a new at any time, which will force a layout recomposition. 但是，只要该样式加载的元素，置于使用应视为密封。However, as soon as that style is placed in use by a loaded element, the should be considered sealed. 尝试对正在使用样式任何单个属性进行更改 (如在集合内的任何内容) 将导致异常引发。Attempting to make a change to any individual property of an in-use style (such as anything within the collection of ) causes an exception to be thrown. 在标记中定义样式被视为一旦加载从资源字典 （对于资源），或包含在页面加载 （对于内联样式），可使用。A style that is defined in markup is considered to be in use as soon as it is loaded from a resource dictionary (for resources), or the page it is contained within is loaded (for inline styles). 是具有特殊优先级依赖项属性。 is a dependency property with special precedence. 本地设置样式通常最高优先级会在运行属性系统。The locally set style generally operates at the highest precedence in the property system. 如果期间加载属性系统检查本地或应用程序指定该类型的资源中的隐式样式在这种情况下，为 null。If the is null at this point, during loading the property system checks for implicit styles in local or application resources that specify that type. 如果样式后仍 null 此步骤中，则出于演示目的的有效样式通常来自默认 （主题） 样式，但默认样式中将不返回属性值。If the style is still null after this step, then the acting style for presentation purposes generally comes from the default (theme) style, but the default style is not returned in the property value. 请参阅[依赖项属性值优先级](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md)或[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。See [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-property-value-precedence.md) or [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是类似于在其他标记属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ms](~/includes/tlasharptla-ms-md.md)]编程模型，如[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_vba](~/includes/tlasharptla-vba-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]。This property is analogous to Tag properties in other [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ms](~/includes/tlasharptla-ms-md.md)] programming models, such as [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_vba](~/includes/tlasharptla-vba-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]. 旨在提供可以在其中存储有关任何一些基本自定义信息的预先存在的属性位置而无需你子类化元素。 is intended to provide a pre-existing property location where you can store some basic custom information about any without requiring you to subclass an element. 因为此属性采用对象，你将需要使用以便设置的属性元素用法中的属性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]带已知和内置类型转换器，如字符串对象之外的任何内容。Because this property takes an object, you would need to use the property element usage in order to set the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] to anything other than an object with a known and built-in type converter, such as a string. 在这种方式中使用的对象通常并不位于标准[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]命名空间，因此可能需要将命名空间映射到外部命名空间，以便作为引入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]元素。Objects used in this manner are typically not within the standard [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] namespaces and therefore may require namespace mapping to the external namespace in order to be introduced as [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 Namespace 映射为 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)和[XAML 和 wpf 自定义类](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-and-custom-classes-for-wpf.md)。For details, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md) and [XAML and Custom Classes for WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-and-custom-classes-for-wpf.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常是`null`在你的应用程序标记或代码中创建的对象。 is frequently `null` for objects that are created in your application markup or code. 这是因为你的那些对象直接创建，不是通过模板。This is because you create those objects directly, not via a template. 对象获取通过从根，遍历逻辑树，或者典型名称引用的引用，不是来自模板。Object references obtained by walking the logical tree from the root, or by typical name references, do not come from a template. 情况可能不是`null`包括操作，例如命中测试，某些低级别的输入事件，遍历与的可视化树的事件处理，或使用枚举器，这可能会返回提供的元素从模板。Cases where might not be `null` include operations such as hit-testing, event handling for certain low-level input events, walking the visual tree with , or working with enumerators, which might return elements that came from templates. 另一种是如果你明确调用针对现有并且使用返回的对象。Another case is if you specifically call against an existing and are work with the returned object. 模板是实际共享的对象，其中仅一次创建模板的内容。Templates are actually shared objects, where the contents of the template are created only once. 因此，如果你获取对来自模板的元素的对象引用，你可能会发现明显的逻辑树无法到达页面根。Therefore, if you obtain an object reference to an element that came from a template, you may find that the apparent logical tree does not reach to the page root. 若要连接到该页面的逻辑树这样的模板引用，则应获取值并继续根据需要该元素树中导航。In order to connect such a template reference to the page's logical tree, you should get the value and continue to navigate that element tree as desired.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免出现在 UI 中，您的处理程序的工具提示可以将标记所处理的事件数据。To prevent a tooltip from appearing in the UI, your handler for can mark the event data handled. 否则，显示工具提示，使用的值属性作为工具提示的内容。Otherwise, the tooltip is displayed, using the value of the property as the tooltip content. 另一种情形是，你可以编写的处理程序的值重置是事件源中，工具提示显示之前的元素的属性。Another possible scenario is that you could write a handler that resets the value of the property for the element that is the event source, just before the tooltip is displayed. 如果不会引发的值是`null`或其他取消设置。 will not be raised if the value of is `null` or otherwise unset. 不要特意将到`null`工具提示已打开，或者打开; 这不会关闭工具提示的效果，并改为将在 UI 中创建不需要的可视化项目时。Do not deliberately set to `null` while a tooltip is open or opening; this will not have the effect of closing the tooltip, and will instead create an undesirable visual artifact in the UI. 事件不能为样式。The event cannot be an in a style. 这是因为此事件的标识符字段重新使用从服务不会公开为服务级别事件的添加/删除事件方法的实现。This is because the identifier field of this event re-uses an implementation from a service that does not expose add/remove event methods for the service-level event. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate|| - 重写实现处理此事件在派生类中的类。Override to implement class handling for this event in derived classes.

summary.span: 获取直接在此元素上或在子元素中建立的触发器的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of triggers established directly on this element, or in child elements.

value.span: 一个强类型的 对象集合。

span.span: A strongly typed collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅在中设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过集合语法所示，或通过访问的集合对象并使用它的各种方法，例如 Add。This property can only be set in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] through the collection syntax shown, or by accessing the collection object and using its various methods such as Add. 要访问集合对象本身的属性是只读的该集合本身是读写。The property to access the collection object itself is read-only, the collection itself is read-write. 仅存在于根元素; 上的属性尝试查找它或将其设置在其他位置将会导致引发异常。The property only exists on root elements; attempting to find it or set it elsewhere will cause an exception to be thrown. 此属性不允许你检查作为中此元素上使用的样式的一部分存在的触发器。This property does not enable you to examine triggers that exist as part of styles in use on this element. 它只报告的按其原义添加到集合，在标记或代码中的触发器的集合。It only reports the collection of triggers that are literally added to the collection, either in markup or code. 元素通常没有现有默认情况下此类元素 (通过模板的实例);很多常见的来自控件组合建立样式中的触发器。Elements do not typically have such elements existing by default (through a template for instance); it is more common for triggers that come from control compositing to be established in styles instead. 在行为方面 (以及尝试确定哪个效果来自哪个元素的声明集合)，触发条件以及触发器产生什么影响可能会针对此元素，或者可能对其逻辑树中的子元素。In terms of behavior (and trying to establish which effect came from which element's declared collection), both the triggering condition and the trigger effect might be on this element, or might be on its child elements in the logical tree. 请注意，如果您使用生存期事件如若要获取此集合，子元素的触发器可能尚未进行完全加载，而且则集合将为小于在运行时将真正。Note that if you use lifetime events such as to get this collection, the child element's triggers might not yet be fully loaded, and the collection will be smaller than it would truly be at run time. 请注意，在元素上建立的触发器集合仅支持，不属性触发器 ()。Note that the collection of triggers established on an element only supports , not property triggers (). 如果需要属性触发器，你必须将这些样式或模板中并将该样式或模板的元素或者直接通过属性，或间接通过隐式样式引用。If you require property triggers, you must place these within a style or template and then assign that style or template to the element either directly through the property, or indirectly through an implicit style reference. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreTriggers**oneOrMoreTriggers* 一个或多个已定义元素。One or more defined elements. 每个此类触发器应包含有效的情节提要操作和引用。Each such trigger is expected to contain valid storyboard actions and references. 请注意此集合仅可以建立一个页的根元素上。Note that this collection can only be established on the root element of a page. 有关详细信息，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md)。For more information, see [Storyboards Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/storyboards-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用元素上未找到资源，在逻辑树向上搜索父资源树，在树的方法相同的资源请求时搜索由参数在运行时。If the resource is not found on the calling element, the parent resource tree is searched upward through the logical tree, in the same way that the tree would be searched if a resource were requested by key at run time. 该方法返回`null`仅当在资源树中，每次树的现有条件的任何位置都不存在该密钥的任何资源，调用。The method returns `null` only if no resource of that key existed anywhere in the resource tree, per the existing conditions of the tree at the time that is called. 通常将立即强制转换为已尝试用返回的资源值进行设置的属性的类型的返回值。Typically you would immediately cast the return value to the type of the property that you were attempting to set with the returned resource value. 方法具有类似的行为，只是返回具有提供的键的资源时，它会引发异常。The method has similar behavior, except that it throws an exception if no resource with the provided key was returned. ## Examples 下面的示例实现一个按钮处理程序，其中的按钮被单击时会将其背景为资源定义画笔获取设置通过调用本身上。The following example is implemented as a button handler, where the button being clicked sets its background to a resource-defined brush obtained by calling on itself. 这将遍历元素树并查找资源 (资源本身中定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]并且不会显示)。This walks the element tree and finds the resource (the resource itself is defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and is not shown). [!code-csharp[BaseElementsSmorgasbord#FETryFindResource](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BaseElementsSmorgasbord/CSharp/Page1.xaml.cs#fetryfindresource)] [!code-vb[BaseElementsSmorgasbord#FETryFindResource](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BaseElementsSmorgasbord/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#fetryfindresource)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直接路由的事件不遵循路由，而仅处理引发它们时对同一元素中。Direct routed events do not follow a route, they are only handled within the same element on which they are raised. 直接路由的事件是否支持其他路由的事件行为： 它们支持的可访问的处理程序集合，并可用作样式。Direct routed events do support other routed event behavior: they support an accessible handlers collection, and can be used as an in a style. 和可能同时会引发在用户启动的系统主题更改控件上。 and might both be raised on controls as a result of user-initiated system theme changes. 主题更改会导致控件模板和包含的可视化树，这反过来会导致整个控件，若要卸载并重新加载的失效。A theme change causes an invalidation of the control template and the contained visual tree, which in turn causes the entire control to unload and reload. 因此不能假定只会在导航离开页面。Therefore cannot be assumed to occur only on navigation away from the page. 请注意，在应用程序开始关闭后，则不会引发事件。Note that the event is not raised after an application begins shutting down. 应用程序时，发生所定义的条件属性出现。Application shutdown occurs when the condition defined by the property occurs. 如果你将清理代码的处理程序中放置事件，例如对于或，它可能不会调用按预期方式。If you place cleanup code within a handler for the event, such as for a or a , it may not be called as expected. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|直接Direct| |委托Delegate||

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应向此元素的大小和位置布局应用布局舍入。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether layout rounding should be applied to this element's size and position during layout.

value.span: 如果应用布局舍入，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if layout rounding is applied; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的元素的属性是`true`，过程中所计算的所有非整型像素值和传递舍入为整数像素值。When the property for an element is `true`, all non-integral pixel values that are calculated during the and passes are rounded to whole pixel values. 此属性被继承的子元素。This property is inherited by child elements. > [!NOTE] > 应设置到`true`根元素上。You should set to `true` on the root element. 布局系统将子坐标添加到父坐标中;因此，如果父坐标不像素边界上，子坐标也是像素边界上。The layout system adds child coordinates to the parent coordinates; therefore, if the parent coordinates are not on a pixel boundary, the child coordinates are also not on a pixel boundary. 如果不能在根目录设置、 设置在的子活动以获取所需的效果。If cannot be set at the root, set on the child to obtain the effect that you want. 对象绘制像素边界上消除了一条边不再处于中间设备像素时，生成的抗锯齿的半透明边缘。Drawing objects on pixel boundaries eliminates the semi-transparent edges that are produced by anti-aliasing, when an edge falls in the middle of a device pixel. 下图显示的单个像素宽度行的位置在设备像素的中间输出。The following illustration shows the output of a single pixel-width line that falls in the middle of a device pixel. 在左侧的行不使用布局舍入，并且是消除锯齿。The line on the left does not use layout rounding and is anti-aliased. 在右侧的行使用布局舍入。The line on the right uses layout rounding. ![反-带锯齿的线与单像素线的比较。](~/add/media/pixelsnaplinecompare.PNG "消除锯齿的线与单像素线的比较。")![Anti-aliased line compared to single pixel line.](~/add/media/pixelsnaplinecompare.PNG "Anti-aliased line compared to single pixel line.") 当你使用布局舍入和调整大小，该布局系统中的列或行的度量值以避免子像素呈现中创建小型变体。When you use layout rounding and sizing, the layout system creates small variations in the column or row measurements to avoid subpixel rendering. 例如，如果一个网格，具有 100 具有 3 列每个大小的总宽度，而不是创建三个列都具有 33.3 的相等宽度，该布局系统创建具有 33 到其中一个的宽度为 34 的宽度的 2 列。For example, if a grid has a total width of 100 with 3 columns each of size , instead of creating three columns that have an equal width of 33.3, the layout system creates 2 columns that have a width of 33 and one that has a width of 34. > [!NOTE] > .NET 4.6 中对布局舍入以减少带边框的控件中的剪切实例进行了更改。In .NET 4.6 changes were made to layout rounding to reduce instances of clipping in controls with borders. 默认情况下，如果目标框架是.NET Framework 4.6 或更高版本启用此功能。By default, this feature is enabled if your Target Framework is .NET Framework 4.6 or higher. 面向的 framework 的早期版本的应用程序可以选择加入到新的行为通过将以下设置添加到 app.config 文件：``时在.NET Framework 4.6 上运行该应用程序后，该设置将仅将生效。Applications that target earlier versions of the framework can opt in into the new behavior by adding the following setting to an app.config file: `` The setting only takes effect when the application is running on the .NET Framework 4.6. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的效果，属性具有单个像素宽度行上。The following example demonstrates the effect that the property has on a single pixel-width line. 在左侧的行不使用布局舍入，并在右侧的行使用布局舍入。The line on the left does not use layout rounding and the line on the right uses layout rounding. 如果渐变调整窗口的大小，你可以看到该布局舍入的区别。If you slowly resize the window, you can see the difference that layout rounding makes. ```xaml ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当和元素上显式设置属性，这些度量值需要布局引用单元格，并且取消此属性设置为的正则效果。When and properties are explicitly set on an element, these measurements take layout precedent and cancel the regular effects of setting this property to . 是[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)]它实际上是依赖项属性的属性访问器。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_net](~/includes/tlasharptla-net-md.md)] property accessor for what is in reality a dependency property. 此特定的依赖项属性非常普遍地具有派生的元素类，尤其是控件中以不同方式设置其原本"默认"值。This particular dependency property quite frequently has its apparent "default" value set differently in derived element classes, particularly controls. 这通常发生在两种方式之一： 为特定的派生类中，但具有不同的元数据，用于设置其默认值; 重新注册依赖项属性或者应用了默认样式以不同方式设置的依赖项属性值。This generally occurs in one of two ways: the dependency property is re-registered to a particular derived class, but with different metadata for setting its defaults; or there is a default style being applied that sets that dependency property value differently. 例如，明显"默认"的为控件将是，即使继承直接从。For example, the apparent "default" of for a control will be , even though inherits direct from . 这是因为该值已重置中的默认样式中的样式的控件模板。This is because that value was reset within the default style of , within the style's control template. 不使用构成布局，因为时根据绝对定位。 does not use when composing layout, because is based on absolute positioning. 当通过继承或任何派生类中，重新定义为此属性的默认值。When inherited by or any derived classes, redefines the default value of this property to be . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`||

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个三个属性上指定宽度的信息。This is one of three properties on that specify width information. 另外两个是和。The other two are and . 如果这些值之间没有冲突，应用程序实际宽度确定的顺序是： 首先必须采用，然后，最后每个都在限制之内，如果。If there is a conflict between these values, the order of application for actual width determination is first must be honored, then , and finally if each of these are within bounds, . 此属性的返回值始终是任何已设置为它的值相同。The return value of this property is always the same as any value that was set to it. 相反，值可能会有所不同。In contrast, the value of the may vary. 布局可能已被拒绝的建议的大小出于某种原因。The layout may have rejected the suggested size for some reason. 此外，该布局系统本身以异步方式工作相对于属性的属性系统集，可能不处理该特定的大小调整属性的更改。Also, the layout system itself works asynchronously relative to the property system set of and may not have processed that particular sizing property change yet. 此外可接受值，此属性也可以是。In addition to acceptable values, this property can also be . 这是如何指定自动调整大小行为。This is how you specify auto sizing behavior. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]你设置的值为字符串"自动"（不区分大小写） 若要启用自动调整大小行为。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] you set the value to the string "Auto" (case insensitive) to enable the auto sizing behavior. 自动调整大小行为意味着元素将填满可用的宽度。Auto sizing behavior implies that the element will fill the width available to it. 但是请注意，特定的控件通常提供将禁用自动调整大小行为，除非专门重新启用了其默认样式中的默认值。Note however that specific controls frequently supply default values in their default styles that will disable the auto sizing behavior unless it is specifically re-enabled. 除了验证检查，没有为具有不确定性上限值，由布局系统强制执行 (这是非常大的数，大于但小于)。In addition to the validation check, there is a nondeterministic upper value bound for that is enforced by the layout system (this is a very large number, larger than but smaller than ). 如果超过此限制，该元素将不会呈现，并不会引发异常。If you exceed this bound, the element will not render, and no exception is thrown. 未设置为远远大于任何可能的可视显示，或你的最大大小可能超出此非确定性上限值。Do not set to a value that is significantly larger than the maximum size of any possible visual display, or you may exceed this nondeterministic upper bound. ##
